Setting.Name: Cancel Undercut Auctions
Setting.Summary: Cancels your auction which have been undercut

Setting.Name: Post to the Auction House
Setting.Summary: Posts items from your inventory to the Auction House

Setting.Name: Check Mail
Setting.Summary: Checks the mailbox when you have new mail

Setting.Name: CycleWait
Setting.Summary: Waits 10 minutes after each cycle of posting/buying

Setting.Name: DepositOreGB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian ore to the guild bank

Setting.Name: DepositHerbsGB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian herbs to the guild bank

Setting.Name: DepositEnchantingMatsGB
Setting.Summary: Deposits enchanting materials to the guild bank

Setting.Name: DepositUncutGemsGB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian uncut gems to the guild bank

Setting.Name: DepositLeatherGB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian leather to the guild bank

Setting.Name: DepositOrePB
Setting.Summary: Deposits ore to your personal bank

Setting.Name: DepositHerbsPB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian herbs to your personal bank

Setting.Name: DepositEnchantingMatsPB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian enchanting materials to your personal bank

Setting.Name: DepositUncutGemsPB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian uncut gems to your personal bank

Setting.Name: DepositLeatherPB
Setting.Summary: Deposits Pandarian leather to your personal bank

Setting.Name: WithdrawGemsGB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws LEGION GEMS to sell from the guild bank (Requires Datastore WoW Addon).

Setting.Name: WithdrawHerbsGB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian herbs from the guild bank (Requires Datastore WoW Addon).

Setting.Name: WithdrawEnchantingMatsGB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian enchanting materials from the guild bank (Requires Datastore WoW Addon).

Setting.Name: WithdrawUncutGemsGB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian uncut gems from the guild bank (Requires Datastore WoW Addon).

Setting.Name: WithdrawLeatherGB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian leather from the guild bank (Requires Datastore WoW Addon).

Setting.Name: WithdrawOrePB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian ore from your personal bank

Setting.Name: WithdrawHerbsPB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian herbs from your personal bank

Setting.Name: WithdrawEnchantingMatsPB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian enchanting materials from your personal bank

Setting.Name: WithdrawUncutGemsPB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian uncut gems from your personal bank

Setting.Name: WithdrawLeatherPB
Setting.Summary: Withdraws Pandarian leather from your personal bank

Setting.Name: Scribe/Alchemist
Setting.Summary: Sends Herbs to your Scribe or Alchemist

Setting.Name: Jewelcrafter
Setting.Summary: Sends Ore and Uncut Gems to your Jewelcrafter

Setting.Name: Enchanter
Setting.Summary: Send Enchanting Materials to your Enchanter

Setting.Name: Leatherworker
Setting.Summary: Send Leather to your Leatherworker

Setting.Name: BuyHerbs
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian herbs.

Setting.Name: BuyOre
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian Ore.

Setting.Name: BuyRareMounts
Setting.Summary: Buys Rare Mounts.

Setting.Name: BuyRareCompanions
Setting.Summary: Buys Rare Companions.

Setting.Name: BuyEnchantingMats
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian enchanting materials.

Setting.Name: BuyShaCrystalEnchants
Setting.Summary: Buys enchants that require Sha Crystals.

Setting.Name: BuyCookingMaterials
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian fish, meat and vegetables used for cooking.

Setting.Name: BuyFlasks
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian flasks.

Setting.Name: BuyUncutGems
Setting.Summary: Buys Pandarian uncut Gems.

Setting.Name: BuyCloth
Setting.Summary: Buys all types of Cloth.

Setting.Name: BuyGlyphs
Setting.Summary: Buys Glyphs.

Setting.Name: DepositGold
Setting.Summary: Deposits all gold except this amount.

Setting.Name: DepositGoldInGbank
Setting.Summary: Allows the option to deposit gold in to the Guid Bank

Setting.Name: BuyOut Threshold
Setting.Summary: The minimum amount of gold required to buy from the auction house.

Setting.Name: SendC.O.D
Setting.Summary: Sends Cash on Delivery mail.

Setting.Name: Recipents
Setting.Summary: Send C.O.D mail to these people

Setting.Name: Prices
Setting.Summary: Price per stack per itemId

Setting.Name: ItemIds
Setting.Summary: Item(s) (ID From Wowhead) to send to C.O.D recipients

Lua.DoString("local goldToKeep={0}*10000 local depositAmount=(GetMoney()-goldToKeep) if depositAmount > 0 then DepositGuildBankMoney(depositAmount) end",Settings["DepositGold"]);
